title: Bug 6656 - Close button moves down when view resized smaller
OB: When a view like the Navigator is resized smaller on Linux, running build 20011127, the tool items move below the label.
EB: These two tool items should stay on the same line as the label regardless of how small the view is. The close button should remain located to the far right corner.
SR:
1. Open the Navigator view.
2. Resize the view to a smaller size.
3. Observe that the tool items move below the label on Linux, running build 20011127.
